fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • An article said the online grocery retailer Ocado had tested “two robotic hands: the RBO Hand 2 developed by the Technische Universität in Berlin; and the LBR iiwa14”. In fact it has tested one robotic hand, the RBO Hand 2, with two different robotic arms: the LBR iiwa14 and the Staubli RX160L (Ocado tests robot with soft touch to handle fruit, 1 February, page 22). • In a feature about Haneen Zoabi (‘Israel is not shocked by Trump’, 31 January, page 12, G2), we said she was the first Israeli-Palestinian woman to be elected to the Knesset when she won a seat in 2009. To clarify: she is the first to be elected on an Arab party’s list. • The leader of Knowsley council is Andy Moorhead, not Alan as we had it in a feature about schools in the area (30 January, page 6, G2).
